author: ajith
msg: Changing the maven.xml to fix the Axis2-181 issue. The problem is not in the generated code but the maven build file. The maven build was configured to copy only the class files where as the .xsb files (generated by XMLBeans) were also required.

author: colm
msg: Remove the note about WINCH on certain platforms. As of r239430, this is no
longer the case and USR1 will be used on all platforms.

author: dims
msg: With this you can run "maven test test-reports" and look at target\test-reports\index.html for the junit test reports.

author: andreas
msg: Applied patch for bug #36382 (copy endorsed libraries from Cocoon). Thanks to Felix Roethenbacher.
